name: lightspeed-retail-sdk
description: Another unofficial Lightspeed Retail API SDK for Node.js

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:storage && npm run test:sqlite && npm run test:postgres && npm run test:mongodb
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prebuild && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run fix-paths && npm run fix-exports
scripts.build:esm: cp index.mjs dist/index.mjs && cp -r src dist/
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build:core && npm run build:storage && npm run build:main

author: https://github.com/darrylmorley
